tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE demand_trends (
    date DATE,
    demand_amount DECIMAL,
    moving_average DECIMAL,
    demand_trend VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE moving_averages (
  id INT,
  date DATE,
  demand INT,
  moving_average DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE trend_analysis (
  id INT,
  date DATE,
  demand INT,
  demand_trend VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE demand_history (
  id INT,
  date DATE,
  demand INT
)

CREATE TABLE time_periods (
  period_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE sales_data (
  transaction_id INT,
  date DATE,
  demand INT
)
